eligibility:
10+2 level (Karnataka PUC, ISCE, CBSE, NIOS, other State Boards), and any recognized bodies in India. It is compulsory to have studied any two subjects â€“ Biology (Botany/Zoology), Chemistry and Biotechnology, at Class 12th Level.
Candidates writing the +2 examinations in March-May 2025 may apply with their class X and XI marks.
Students pursuing International curriculum must note that eligibility is according to AIU stipulations:
Applicants pursuing IB curriculum must have 3 HL and 3 SL with 24 credits.
Applicants pursuing GCE / Edexcel must have a minimum of 3 A levels with a grade not less than C.
why_choose: Why choose this course? Diverse career opportunities in biotechnology and botany. Practical skills for hands-on industry experience. Cutting-edge research integrated into the curriculum. Interdisciplinary training fostering adaptability and teamwork. Strong foundation for the evolving biotechnology industry. Unique blend of theoretical and practical knowledge.
what_learn: What you will learn? Profound knowledge of biotechnological methods and botanical sciences. Hands-on experience with diverse laboratory techniques in botany and biotechnology. Competency in data analysis and statistical software applications in both fields. Specialization in proteomics, genomics, and the study of plant diversity. In-depth understanding of disease biology, computational biology, and plant anatomy. Expertise in biophysics, agricultural entrepreneurship, and plant biotechnology.
modules: Modules Fundamental concepts of Microbiology and Cell Biology. Hands-on experience in Plant Anatomy and Developmental Biology. Holistic education integrating language and environmental studies. Year 1 Practical skills in Microbiology and Cell Biology. In-depth knowledge of Plant Diversity. Practical exposure to Mushroom Cultivation and Algal Technology. Advanced knowledge in Genetics and Immunology. Practical skills in Genetics Comprehensive understanding of Angiosperm Systematics and Taxonomy. Year 2 Practical exposure in Functional Ecology and Agricultural Entrepreneurship. Hands-on experience in various techniques in Biological Sciences. Holistic education integrating language and practical applications. Summer Internship Expertise in Animal Biotechnology and Bioprocess Engineering. Proficiency in Agronomy, Agricultural Meteorology, Plant Micro-techniques, and Economic Botany. Year 3 Comprehensive knowledge of Plant Biotechnology and Regulation. Advanced comprehension of Analytical Techniques in Biological Sciences. In-depth understanding of Genetic Engineering techniques. Proficiency in research methodology and data analysis. Expertise in biotechnology entrepreneurship and research projects. Specialization in medical biotechnology and disease biology. Year 4 Comprehensive understanding of biophysics and computational biology. Hands-on experience in food, nutrition, and health. Advanced knowledge in proteomics and genomics.
career: Career prospects Biotechnologist in pharmaceutical and agri-business industries. Botanist specializing in biodiversity conservation and research. Data analyst for biotech and botanical studies. Genetics and genomics researcher or analyst. Forensic laboratory technician specializing in botany. Environmental biotechnologist or ecologist.
